subject: Football
Relocation of Business
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: With their move approved by the team owners, the Rams will give the Los Angeles area its first N.F.L. team since the Rams and the Raiders left in 1995. The Chargers have the option to join them as soon as next season.
snippet: With their move approved by the team owners, the Rams will give the Los Angeles area its first N.F.L. team since the Rams and the Raiders left in 1995. The Chargers have the option to join them as soon as next season.
